channel.title: Blogging on Lagging Indicators
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on Lagging Indicators

item.title: Why (not) write online?
item.description: a) improve communication skills by forcing myself to formalize an opinion. Feedback from anonymous readers may either point out an error I made while translating what I think to a written document or a flaw in the argument itself. Of course, I need to be willing to be wrong, and reminding myself that I am excited about learning is an powerful way to cope with finding errors in my work. Writing online is a low-barrier opportunity to become comfortable with this.
